vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H7803H', 'matchingForm': 'שׁוּתֶ֫לַח', 'stepTransliteration': 'shu.te.lach', 'gloss': 'Shuthelah', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.7.21', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '書提拉', '_es_Gloss': 'Suthela', '_zh_Gloss': '书提拉'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8364', 'matchingForm': 'שֻׁתַלְחִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'shu.tal.chi', 'gloss': 'Shuthelahite', '_searchResultRange': 'Num.26.35@Num.26.35-1Chr.7.20', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '書提拉人', '_es_Gloss': 'Suthalaitas', '_zh_Gloss': '书提拉人'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.35;
son of: Ephraim (H0669);
brother of: Becher (H1071H), Tahan (H8465), Ezer (H5827), Elead (H0496) and Beriah (H1283H);
father of: Eran (H6197) and Bered (H1260H)
Also named: shu.tal.chi (שֻׁתַלְחִי "Shuthelahite" H8364)
§ Shuthelah = "noise of breaking"
son of Ephraim, ancestor of Joshua, and progenitor of family of Ephraim
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Efraín; (b)   hijo de Zabad; tribu de Efraín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書提拉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "破碎之雜音"
以法蓮的兒子, 以法蓮是約書亞的祖先, 以法蓮支派的始祖
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
书提拉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "破碎之杂音"
以法莲的儿子, 以法莲是约书亚的祖先, 以法莲支派的始祖

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.21;
son of: Zabad (H2066H)
§ Shuthelah = "noise of breaking"
son of Ephraim, ancestor of Joshua, and progenitor of family of Ephraim
